body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Basic Information     Goods & Services              Goods & Services       Only a very limited selection of personal care items are available at the visitor center bookstore. Otherwise, food, supplies, gas, lodging and similar services are not available in Natural Bridges. These are available in nearby towns like Blanding, UT, Monticello, UT and Cortez, CO. Visit Utah's Canyon Country for more information.    Cell Phones    Cell phone service is not available at Natural Bridges.
title: Natural Bridges National Monument: Goods & Services
